events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection on March 31, 2024. They provided initial details of the accident.
The claim was reviewed and classified under the Auto Accident cluster based on the presence of keywords such as vehicle and collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to provide personalized support and guide through the claims process.
The insurer acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed that the investigation would begin shortly.
Requested the policyholder to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim.
Received the vehicle photos, official police report, and initial repair estimates from the customer as requested.
The claims team started reviewing submitted documents and contacted witnesses for statements related to the vehicle accident.
Completed investigation confirmed fault on the opposing driver and verified damages to the policyholder's vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover repair costs and other damages according to the terms of the insurance policy.
The customer provided positive feedback regarding the clarity of communication and prompt handling of their claim.
Final approval was granted for the claim to proceed with payment based on the agreed settlement amount.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the policyholderâ€™s bank account promptly.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the payment was received and the repair process completed.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived in the system for future reference and compliance purposes.
